item.title: Version 0.2.5
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.5

  • Redesigned effects inspector with empty state, optimistic UI, and toggle
  • Multi-clip drag via marquee selection
  • Open Recent Project action in command palette
  • Sidebar items now select on mouseDown for faster response
  • Improved Add Task field UX with full-row click and keyboard passthrough
  • Fixed relative clip distances during multi-clip keyboard moves
  • Fixed marquee keyboard move glitches (selection, ghost trails, CALayer sync)
  • Fixed waveform loading shimmer artifacts after project load
  • Major performance improvements: fingerprint-based render skipping, structural update path, GPU bypass for keyboard moves

item.title: Version 0.2.4
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.4

  • Switched clip interaction from zone-based to CMD-modifier based
  • Added custom cursors for fade handles, timestretch, and creation mode
  • Implemented solo audio logic so soloed tracks are actually heard
  • Hide tracks from timeline with recursive group support
  • Smooth gain slider by moving gain to GPU and bypassing SwiftUI during drag
  • Smooth BPM stepper and swing slider performance
  • Fixed swing grid snapping and visual positions during drag
  • Fixed cursor display in audio focus mode

item.title: Version 0.2.3
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.3

  • Unified plugin category system with consistent icons
  • Non-activating plugin panels with automatic text editing detection
  • Simplified Key & Scale popover
  • Enlarged clickable area of transport info buttons (Key, BPM)
  • Improved timeline grid line visibility in dark mode
  • Fixed marquee vertical scroll direction
  • Filtered out modal dialog app hangs from Sentry reporting
  • Improved update error handling with guided instructions

item.title: Version 0.2.2
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.2

  • Fixed: Sparkle update dialog buttons now respond to clicks
  • Fixed: Event monitors no longer consume events from other windows

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.1

  • Unified drag & drop for instruments and effects from the sidebar
  • Native sidebar lists for better performance
  • Auto-open instrument picker when creating instrument tracks
  • Fixed sidebar indentation and collapsible sections
  • Fixed clip drag ghost snapping
  • Fixed display tracks for grouped tracks

item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.0

  • Direct distribution outside App Store
  • Automatic updates via Sparkle
  • Crash reporting via Sentry
  • Move to Applications prompt for smoother installation
  • Removed sandbox restrictions for better AU plugin compatibility
